entry.title: Dangerous Stranger (Master Mini Expansion #12 (Finaler Bosses))
entry.summary: Top: When an opponent gains RP, they also discard a card from their hand, then you gain RP equal to the STAR of that card.

Source Mini Expansion #12 (Finaler Bosses)

Cost $6
Card Type Master
Quantity
Star Rating 5⭐
Element Water
Type Citizen
Top: When an opponent gains RP, they also discard a card from their hand, then you gain RP equal to the STAR of that card.

References "Stranger Danger" reference. Resident Evil 4, trader quote.
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2019
